title: Enabling LLM-based Environment Manipulation in Robotic Simulations via MCP
description: The  MCP  Server  acts  as  the  ”nervous  system,”  exposingthe  functionalities  of  the  simulation  environment  as  a  setof  standardized  Tools.  Based  on  our  implementation,  theserver  exposes  a  comprehensive  set  of  capabilities  for  sceneand object manipulation
